body.name: Newbealer Travel Iron with Dual Voltage - 120V/220V Lightweight Dry for Clothes (No Steam), Non-Stick Ceramic Soleplate, 302℉ Mini Heat Press Machine, w/Spray Bottle, Pouch & Silicone Stand
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 4 hrs 13 mins
features: 【100-240V Dual Voltage, Ideal for Travel】The mini iron is designed with a dual-voltage switch, which allows you to bring it anywhere worldwide. 300 watts of power removes wrinkles from almost any fabric for photo-worthy outfits. When traveling abroad, just select between 100 and 240 volts, and prepare the plug adapter in advance!

【Mini Size & Extreme Lightweight】Take a load off with this Micro Iron! Dimensions: 6" X 3" X 1.3", Weight: 0.95 lbs. Small and lightweight enough to fit in any suitcase or travel bag. The heavy-duty technology inside this lightweight iron delivers fast, wrinkle-free results. Perfect for business trips and vacations, making travel more sophisticated and stylish.

【Nonstick Ceramic Soleplate】The portable travel iron adopts Diamond Coated ceramic soleplate, which conducts heat quickly and more scratch-resistant than stainless steel plates. Easy cleaning smooth surface, glides effortlessly over delicate fabrics. The front and back double pointed arc design is helpful for ironing small areas such as buttons, plackets, collars, etc.

【Dry Ironing & Easy to Use】Quickly heats up and maintained at a constant temperature of 302℉ (150℃) within 2 mins, you can go directly to dry ironing. Use the practical resistant silicone stand during use to rest the hot iron, no damage to desktop. If you need to iron clothes with more wrinkles, spray some water on top of it with your spray bottle first to make it smoother.

【All Types of Fabric】The dual-voltage iron is suitable for silk, plush, wool, cotton, linen, polyester, brocade and other fabrics. A travel pouch, water spray bottle and silicone rest are included for added convenience and protection. It also can be used for heat transfer, crafting of small objects. With a 1-Year Warranty and a customer care team always ready to smooth things over, shop it with confidence!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ceramic Glaze Panel Nonstick Ceramic Soleplate offers superior glide and a precision tip for faster easier ironing.Large contact area, faster heating, faster ironing. Great on-the-go worldwide Dual voltage design allows you to refresh clothes anywhere you go. Easily switch between 120V and 220VDon't forget to prepare a plug adapter. Mini Heat Press Iron Constant Temperature of 302℉, 360-degree ironing, easy to used on decals and heat transfer patterns of small objects, like patchwork, applique etc. Portable Handheld Iron Powerful 300-Watt makes it quickly removes wrinkles from almost any fabric.Designed with a collapsible handle, compact and easy to use and store.

I'm Dry Iron, Not Steam Iron What You Need to Know About Me? Users with large hands may need to get used to my petite stature. Users with small hands are a perfect match for me.I am petite and light-weighted, you won't feel tired after long hours working.I'm particularly good at working in difficult positions like collars, plackets, pockets, around buttons etc.Although I don't have a steam function, you can use the attached spray bottle to achieve wet ironing.I can heat up quickly and also works well for pressing seams, and other small intricate work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Lightweight, foldable, takes up very little space, and works great. The silicone mat is important as it gives you a place to set the iron down between ironings. I prefer ironed, wrinkle-free clothing at all times but I also like to travel light - this works as a perfect solution for me as I can press items when I need them. This iron heats up fast, gets hot enough to work well (even in Europe when using less amps), has a long cord for negotiating hard to reach outlets, and comes with a silicon pad for a safe cooling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with it so far.
reviews.reviewText: Great little iron. Using it for wood working and it's perfect size for what I need. Came with a spray bottle and nice bag to keep it in. Love that the handles can be put down flat if needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well as a travel iron, a bit too small for regular use
reviews.reviewText: I got this because it's been a bit of a nuisance steaming all the clothes we own. I chose this because it's cute, small, and I wanted to match our white and gold steamer. It does its job well, but it's much too small to use regularly. It would work well as a travel iron, but when ironing many clothes, the size just becomes too uncomfortable in your hand. Also, the silicone heat protectant pad it comes with gets very, very hot. I rested the pad on top of a box when I first tried it, and as it heated up, the heat from the iron started burning the box. It's not a big deal, but I do imagine that the heat may damage a surface if you're not careful. This will be a great tool when traveling, but I'll need to buy another iron for day to day use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Never Thought I'd Say An Iron Is Cute
reviews.reviewText: This is a super cute and compact travel iron. Has a toggle to control voltage dependent upon local or international travel. Heats up nicely to touch up cotton shirts when on the road. This is a petite travel, you'll want to be realistic about heat capabilities. It's clearly spelled out in the product description. The iron works great. I'm quite pleased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good little iron for travel
reviews.reviewText: I specifically waited to do my ironing today until I receive this tiny iron. I had 100% cotton shirts and some sweaters which I won’t have these when I travel but I wanted to see. So it was effective on 100% shirts but it takes longer obviously 😉 other stuff I was pretty happy. The hotel irons are almost always horribly leaks with calcium deposits and I always had to use muslin sheets to iron my clothes, not anymore.Two things are not my favorite (but not deal breakers):The cable is bulky and stiff, for little iron it’s too thick (which is normal for the voltage) so it slows to glide.The iron gets hot and the silicon mat is good for it but that gets hot as well, so be careful where you position the silicone and after you’re done make sure it’s on a safe until it cools down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The iron is small but it doesn't get hot, it just gets just warm. I took it on vacation and it was a waste of money and very frustrating. It never finished heating up. , so if you like wrinkle-free clothes, this is NOT for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best little iron I've ever used
reviews.reviewText: Borrowed this iron during a trip to Italy. Everyone in our group used it and loved it. Just ordered mine. It's dual voltage and heats up quickly. Did a great job - small but mighty. If you like your clothes crisp and wrinkle free - this is a must have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Handy travel iron
reviews.reviewText: Heats up fast and I love how compact it is. I wish the handles were a bit wider, could be a problem if your hands are large.
Es muy práctica y sirve de maravilla. Solo hay que considerar que tarda en enfriar, pero me sirvió bastante en mi viaje y la pude llevar en mi maleta de mano sin problema.
Es muy pequeña y práctica de usar. La he probado y cumple su función, aún no he viajado con ella, pero no abarca tanto espacio, es ligera. Muy buena compra

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 10, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Enfin un fer a repasser que je pourrait transporter partout avec moi en vacance! Il est petit et super efficace ! Cest la 1er fois que j'utilise un fer sans vapeur et franchement il repasse bien !Fournis avec une pochette de rangement donc top! Une plaque en silicone pour y déposer son fer dessus ,un spray pour l'eau pour mettre sur les vêtements si plis résistant ou vêtements trop froissé.La prise en main est bonne grâce a au deux poignées sur le fer. En bref il est vraiment bien ! Plus besoin d'apporter mon gros fer ! Celui ci ce glisse dans un sac et ni vu ni connu !Bonne qualité pour le moment...a voir dans le temps sur l'utilisation...

Top Verarbeitung und Qualität. Das Bügeleisen wird schnell warm und tut was es tun sollte. Durch das geringe Gewicht muss man natürlich bedenken die Bügelwäsche entsprechend mit dem angelieferten Befeuchter gut vorzubereiten oder evtl. auf das Bügeleisen mehr Druck auszuüben. Von Vorteil natürlich für Flugreisen, da es geringes Gewicht und klein. Die Abkühlphase dürfte etwas kürzer ausfallen aber ansonsten tolles Gerät!
